typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PROVIDER_ID as integer,
		CMS_Provider_ID as string,
		UPIN as string,
		NPI as string,
		TIN as string,
		TIMELY_FILING_LIMIT as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		PROVIDER_NAME_PREFIX as string,
		Provider_Type_Code as string,
		Primary_Taxonomy_Code as string,
		PROVIDER_NAME_SUFIX as string,
		PROVIDER_TITLE as string,
		SITE_ID as integer,
		SITE_NAME as string,
		PRIMARY_SITE_FLAG as string,
		PROVIDER_SPECIALTY_ID as string,
		SPECIALTY_DESC as string,
		PHYSICAL_ADDRESS1 as string,
		PHYSICAL_ADDRESS2 as string,
		PHYSICAL_CITY as string,
		PHYSICAL_STATE as string,
		PHYSICAL_ZIP as string,
		Country_Code as string,
		Contact_First_Name as string,
		Contact_Last_Name as string,
		Location_name as string,
		Address_Type as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS2 as string,
		MAILING_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE as string,
		MAILING_ZIP as string,
		PHONE as string,
		FAX as string,
		EXCLUDEFROMMRCHASE as string,
		EXCLUDEFROMPRRELATIONSHIP as string,
		SITE_TYPE as string,
		DEA_NUMBER as string,
		LANGUAGE as string,
		Client_Provider_ID as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Email_Address as string,
		Email_Usage_Type_Code as string,
		County as string,
		Phone_Number_2 as string,
		Phone_Number_3 as string,
		Fax_Number_2 as string,
		Fax_Number_3 as string,
		Client_Location_ID as string,
		Location_Usage_Type_Code as string,
		Location_Contact_Full_Name as string,
		Location_Contact_First_Name as string,
		Location_Contact_Last_Name as string,
		SSN as string,
		Network_Ind as string,
		Facility_Code as string,
		Management_Group_Code as string,
		Location_Key as string,
		Source_System_Of_Record as string,
		Medicare_Facility_Number as string,
		Provider_Location_Effective_Date as string,
		Provider_Location_Termination_Date as string,
		Usage_Preference_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Provider_Alternate_Identifier as string,
		Provider_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source(output(
		Specialty_ID as string,
		Specialty_Description as string,
		Taxonomy_Code as string,
		Taxonomy_Desc_Type as string,
		Taxonomy_Description as string,
		Provider_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source3
source(output(
		Provider_Site_ID as integer,
		Provider_Site as string,
		Provider_Site_name as string,
		Provider_KEY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source4
source1 select(mapColumn(
		PROVIDER_ID,
		Provider_Type_Code,
		Primary_Taxonomy_Code,
		SITE_ID,
		PRIMARY_SITE_FLAG,
		PROVIDER_SPECIALTY_ID,
		SITE_TYPE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, source2 lookup(Select1@PROVIDER_ID == source2@Provider_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1, source3 lookup(PROVIDER_SPECIALTY_ID == Specialty_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Specialty_ID, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2, source4 lookup(SITE_ID == Provider_Site_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup3
Lookup3 sink(input(
		Provider_Supplemental_Id as integer,
		Provider_KEY as string,
		Primary_Specialty_Code as string,
		Primary_Type_Code as string,
		Primary_Taxonomy_Code as string,
		Provider_Site_Id as integer,
		Primary_Site_Flag as string,
		Site_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Provider_KEY = Provider_Alternate_Identifier,
		Primary_Specialty_Code = Specialty_ID,
		Primary_Type_Code = source3@Provider_Type_Code,
		Primary_Taxonomy_Code,
		Provider_Site_Id = SITE_ID,
		Primary_Site_Flag = PRIMARY_SITE_FLAG,
		Site_Type = SITE_TYPE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
